Name: Bring me a man, Santa
About the game: 2020 Xmas is coming and some of our guys got together to eat a juicy turkey. Now, while you take part in their night, you need to warm them up so that they can enjoy the best day of the year on their birthday suit, in other words, naked! To experience this, use your mouse and move the cursor over the characters' bodies trying to collect all candies. Stars will pop up, so take them to multiply your points. If you see a gift, get it as fast as you can! It's your opportunity to take off the guys' clothes! Features 7 Hot Animated Boys; A one-hand game; Easy to play; CG Animated Gallery;
